title: Livestock Disease Transmission Parameters Database
text: curated database animal disease modelling, contains data infectious periods, transmission rates, pathogen survival, diagnostic tests, prevalence, control measures multiple livestock diseases. Originally developed BIOSECURE consortium semi-systematic literature review. information methodology, see accompanying publication: Antonopoulos, ., Ciria, N., Regan, √Å., Tubay, J., Ciaravino, G., Hayes, B., Lambert, S., Vergne, T., Velkers, F., Biebaut, E., Viltrop, ., Dewulf, J., Charlier, J., Fischer, E., & Palau, . . (2025). PARAMETRA: transmission modelling database livestock diseases. Preventive Veterinary Medicine, 245, 106668. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.prevetmed.2025.106668 database continues grow thanks user contributions via PARAMETRA submission form. availability parameters pathogen, parameter type, year study type can visualized .

title: Livestock Disease Transmission Parameters Database
text: Click download parametra Excel file. file can also found data-raw/parametra.xlsx.

title: Livestock Disease Transmission Parameters Database
text: Access database individual sheets directly R programming environments livestock disease transmission modeling. Download CSV files R Navigate CSV file data-raw/tables Click raw top right Copy link (starting https://raw.githubusercontent.com/..) Example: Download parametra_long.csv (containing parameter tables) directly R: Python:

title: Livestock Disease Transmission Parameters Database
text: PARAMETRA entry contains parameter, pathogen, reference. Additional information varies parameter type may include host species, study type, value, upper lower confidence intervals. organized following tables: Transmission: Reproduction number, transmission parameter, probability infection given direct/indirect contact, probability reactivation latent infection, Infectious/Latent/Incubation: Infectious period, latent period, incubation period, shape, Pathogen survival: Pathogen survival various surfaces disinfection procedures Diagnostic Test: Specificity, sensitivity Within Herd Prevalence: Within herd prevalence Regional Prevalence: Herd prevalence, global prevalence Control Plan: Voluntary compulsory national regional control plans Relevant Information: relevant parameters modelling tables aggregated parametra_long. can find full documentation .

title: Livestock Disease Transmission Parameters Database
text: parametra_crossref table contains bibliographic information found Crossref references (‚Äúref‚Äù) cited database.

title: Livestock Disease Transmission Parameters Database
text: available excel file: LOT (List Terms): List terms used database meanings Change log: Tracks modifications, updates, version history Endemic pathogens: List endemic pathogens parameter availability summary Epidemic pathogens: List epidemic pathogens parameter availability summary AMR pathogens: List antimicrobial resistance pathogens parameter availability summary

title: Livestock Disease Transmission Parameters Database
text: two ways contribute new parameters PARAMETRA database:

title: Livestock Disease Transmission Parameters Database
text: Visit PARAMETRA submission form Fill required fields single parameter entry Submit form

title: Livestock Disease Transmission Parameters Database
text: Download Excel template Fill Excel template parameter entries, using PARAMETRA database reference proper formatting. Upload file PARAMETRA submission form submissions reviewed PARAMETRA administrators added database ensure data quality consistency.

title: Livestock Disease Transmission Parameters Database
text: Natalia Ciria Artiga: Natalia.Ciria@uab.cat Alistair Antonopoulos: Alistair@kreavet.com

title: Livestock Disease Transmission Parameters Database
text: PARAMETRA developed part BIOSECURE Project, funded European Union‚Äôs HORIZON Europe FARM2FORK project.

title: Control Plan Parameters Table ‚Äî ControlPlan
text: dataset containing information disease control programs plans implemented different countries various animal pathogens.

title: Control Plan Parameters Table ‚Äî ControlPlan
text: data frame 19 variables: country Country control plan implemented pathogen Name infectious agent host Host species host_type Type host host_breed Specific breed host host_age Age age group hosts host_other Additional host characteristics plan_implemented Whether control plan implemented plan_voluntary_compulsary Voluntary compulsary plan plan_coverage Geographical scope plan country_disease_status Disease status classification plan_type Type control plan last_updated Date last control plan update remarks Additional notes comments ref_short Short reference: source author year year Year publication ref Reference: source doi url filled_by Data entry person identifier parameter_type Category parameter

title: Control Plan Parameters Table ‚Äî ControlPlan
text: Compiled various official sources publications (see "ref" column)

text: data frame 19 variables: parameter Parameter measured test_type Type diagnostic test used pathogen Name infectious agent host Host species host_type Type host host_breed Specific breed host host_age Age age group hosts host_other Additional host characteristics study_type Study type sample_type Type biological sample used value Numeric value parameter lower_cl Lower bound confidence/credible interval upper_cl Upper bound confidence/credible interval remarks Additional notes comments ref_short Short reference: source author year year Year publication ref Reference: source doi url filled_by Data entry person identifier parameter_type Category parameter

title: Parameters Table (Long Format) ‚Äî parametra_long
text: comprehensive dataset combining parameter tables single long-format table. Contains information infectious diseases animal populations, including: transmission parameters, pathogen survival, diagnostic tests, prevalence data, control measures. source table entry identified "ParameterType" column.

title: Parameters Table (Long Format) ‚Äî parametra_long
text: data frame 41 variables: parameter Parameter measured if_other Additional parameter specifications unit Units measurement model_type Model classification (e.g., SI, SIR) model_mixing Mixing pattern population model_scale Scale model study_type Study type pathogen Name infectious agent variant_strain Specific variant strain host Host species host_type Type host host_breed Specific breed host host_age Age age group hosts host_other Additional host characteristics vaccine_seeder Vaccination status seeder/inoculated animals vaccine_contact Vaccination status contact animals vaccine Type vaccine used applicable value Numeric value parameter lower_cl Lower bound confidence/credible interval upper_cl Upper bound confidence/credible interval estimation_type Statistical approach used (Frequentist/Bayesian) estimation_method Method used estimation remarks Additional notes comments ref_short Short reference: source author year year Year publication ref Reference: source doi url filled_by Data entry person identifier parameter_type Category parameter inoculated_contact Inoculation contact status material Type material medium survival measured test_type Type diagnostic test used sample_type Type biological sample used time_period Time period study country Country region data collected sampling_purpose Purpose sampling conducted info_level Level information detail plan_implemented Whether control plan implemented plan_voluntary_compulsary Voluntary compulsary plan plan_coverage Geographical scope plan country_disease_status Disease status classification plan_type Type control plan last_updated Date last control plan update

title: Parameters Table (Long Format) ‚Äî parametra_long
